    st = 0

    while (st+1)<m:
        if L[st]>L[st+1]:

                ans+=L[st]-pr
                bst=False
            else:
                ans+=L[st]-pr+n
            pr = L[st]
        
        st+=1
    if bst:
        ans+=L[st]-1
    else:
        ans+=L[st]-pr+n
    print(ans)

def solve(n, m, b):
    b = [1] + b
    s = 0
    for i in range(m):
        s += (b[i+1]-b[i] + n) % n
    return s

def test():
    assert solve(4, 3, [3, 2, 3]) == 6
    assert solve(4, 3, [2, 3, 3]) == 2
    print("test passes")
